title: Arcesium | SSE | Bangalore
content:
Education: BTech (EEE) Tier 2 College, India
Years of experience: 3+
Prior Experience: Mygate
Company: Arcesium
Title/Level: SSE
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 23LPA
LTI: 1.5 LPA
Performance bonus: 1.5 LPA - 2.5LPA (Performance based)
Total First Year Salary: 26 - 27 LPA

title: Microsoft | L60 | Noida
content:
- Education: B.Tech (CSE) from Tier 3
- Years of Experience: 1.8 (Full Time) + 0.5 (Internship)
- Prior Experience: FAANG (1.5 years) + MNC (0.8 year)
- ⁠Previous CTC: ₹19,00,000 (Base Pay)
- Date of the Offer: June 2024
- Company: Microsoft
- Title/Level: L60
- Location: Noida
- Base Pay: ₹24,00,000
- Joining Bonus: ₹3,00,000
- Performance Bonus: 0 - 20%
- Stock Bonus: $70,000 / 4 (≈ ₹58.5 Lakhs in 4 years)
- Total Compensation for Year 1 (Base Pay + Joining Bonus + Performance Bonus + Stocks): ₹24 L + ₹3 L + ₹2.4 L (@ 10%) + ₹14.6 L (25%) ≈ ₹44 L⁠
- Total Compensation for Year 2 (Base Pay + Performance Bonus + Stocks): ₹24 L + ₹2.4 L (@ 10%) + ₹14.6 L (25%) ≈ ₹41 L⁠⁠
- Benefits: Standard Microsoft Benefits
- Other details: The above offer is after 1 round of negotiation (very slight change in Base Pay and Stocks). Other offers are from Google (L3) and a mid-sized startup. Tried to push for L61 at Microsoft as I answered all the interview questions well, but it was not successful. Is there any room for further negotiation?
salaryTotal: For Year 1 (base Pay + Joining Bonus + Performance Bonus + Stocks): Rs24 L + Rs3 L + Rs2.4 L (@ 10%) + Rs14.6 L (25%) \u2248 Rs44 L\u2060
